title: Flipkart Reviews Scraper
description: Extract product reviews from Flipkart. Accepts product or product-review URLs, auto-cleans them, and uses API-first extraction when pid is available.

startUrl.title: Flipkart URL
startUrl.description: Flipkart product URL or product-review URL. Full product URLs with pid/lid query params improve API reliability.

startUrls.title: Multiple URLs
startUrls.description: Optional list of product/product-review URLs to scrape in one run.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of reviews
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of reviews to collect per product. Pagination is handled automatically.

max_pages.title: Maximum pages per product
max_pages.description: Safety cap for review pagination per product.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for requests. Enable Apify Proxy if needed for anti-bot bypass.
